snippet.title: ZOROASTRA - Official Gameplay Trailer A Open World Single Player Game (2018) HD
snippet.description:
Enter Zoroastra an immersive first-person, action-adventure game set in Mediterranean antiquity. (single player) Fight, explore and uncover the secrets of this mysterious world. The Gods saw an end to their creation and brought destruction upon humanity. Culture has been lost, people died in masses and now an ancient demigod takes responsibility to recreate the world as he is the last one known on earth who could reverse the horrible events and investigate the true cause of this downfall. Your character wakes up in a familiar room from which he enters the world and reincarnates every time you die in-game. Experience the world with fast-paced melee combat, lots of riddles, adventures and monumental ancient sites. Liberate the remnants of civilization, fortify your base, and expand your area of influence. Please leave a Rating and a Comment below. Like our page on Facebook: http://bit.ly/2stILd7 Thanks for watching! 

➤ Watch MORE Trailers HERE - http://bit.ly/2JSXYNN
➤ SUBSCRIBE - http://bit.ly/2kWQ9vO

Subscribe for the latest PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch PC, iso/Android Gameplay, Trailers, Walkthrough and Games News.

Zoroastra's website: https://www.indiedb.com/games/zoroastra
